channel.title: billings on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in billings on SoftLayer API

item.title: GetBareMetalBillingItems.cs
item.description: //----------------------------------------------------------------------- // <copyright file="GetBareMetalBillingItems.cs" company="Softlayer"> // SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. // </copyright> // <license> // http://sldn.softlayer.com/article/License // </license> //----------------------------------------------------------------------- namespace GetBareMetalBillingItemsNamespace { using System; class GetBareMetalBillingItems { /// <summary> /// Retrieve the billing info for the Bare Metals in the account. /// This script makes a single call to the getHardware() method in the /// SoftLayer_Account API service and uses a object mask to get the /// billing items and items for each Bare Metal server in the account.

item.title: GetInvoices.cs
item.description: //----------------------------------------------------------------------- // <copyright file="GetInvoices.cs" company="Softlayer"> // SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. // </copyright> // <license> // http://sldn.softlayer.com/article/License // </license> //----------------------------------------------------------------------- namespace GetInvoicesNamespace { using System; class GetInvoices { /// <summary> /// Retrieve the billing info for the Bare Metals in the account. /// This script makes a single call to the getInvoices() method in the /// SoftLayer_Account API service and uses a object mask to get more /// information about the invoices. /// </summary> /// <manualPages> /// http://sldn.

item.title: GetServerCost.cs
item.description: //----------------------------------------------------------------------- // <copyright file="GetServerCost.cs" company="Softlayer"> // SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. // </copyright> // <license> // http://sldn.softlayer.com/article/License // </license> //----------------------------------------------------------------------- namespace GetServerCostNamespace { using System; using System.Linq; class GetServerCost { /// <summary> /// Get the recurring cost of all servers on your account. /// Get a list of servers on a SoftLayer account along with their recurring /// monthly costs. We can get that by calling getHardware() in the /// SoftLayer_Account API service with an object mask to retrieve cost.

item.title: GetVirtualGuestBillingItem.cs
item.description: //----------------------------------------------------------------------- // <copyright file="GetVirtualGuestBillingItem.cs" company="Softlayer"> // SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. // </copyright> // <license> // http://sldn.softlayer.com/article/License // </license> //----------------------------------------------------------------------- namespace GetVirtualGuestBillingItemNamespace { using System; class GetVirtualGuestBillingItem { /// <summary> /// Retrieve the billing items for the VSI in the account. /// This script makes a single call to the getVirtualGuests() method in the /// SoftLayer_Account API service and uses a object mask to get the /// billing items and items for each VSI server in the account.
